languages.text: {n}Голос Паскаля становится тяжелее и мрачнее.{/n} "Поиск знания — наша высшая по приоритету миссия. Но то, что обещал Деменц — не знание, а его искаженная копия. Деус Механикус велел нам искать не это".

{n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."
languages.original_text: {n}Голос Паскаля становится тяжелее и мрачнее.{/n} "Поиск знания — наша высшая по приоритету миссия. Но то, что обещал Деменц — не знание, а его искаженная копия. Деус Механикус велел нам искать не это".

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The search for knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz had promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的声音变得更加沉重、更加阴郁。{/n}“求知远征是我们最优先的使命。然而，德曼兹带给我们的并不是知识，而是对知识的恶意扭曲。这并不是万机之神命令我们寻求的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的声音变得更加沉重、更加阴郁。{/n}“求知远征是我们最优先的使命。然而，德曼兹带给我们的并不是知识，而是对知识的恶意扭曲。这并不是万机之神命令我们寻求的东西。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voz de Pasqal se vuelve más pesada y grave.{/n} «La búsqueda del conocimiento es nuestra misión más importante. Pero lo que Dementz prometía no era conocimiento sino una versión distorsionada del mismo. No era lo que el Deus Mechanicus nos había encomendado buscar».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voz de Pasqal se vuelve más pesada y grave.{/n} «La búsqueda del conocimiento es nuestra misión más importante. Pero lo que Dementz prometía no era conocimiento sino una versión distorsionada del mismo. No era lo que el Deus Mechanicus nos había encomendado buscar».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルの声が重く、陰鬱になっていく。{/n}「知識探求は私たちの最優先の使命だ。しかし、デメンツが約束したのは知識ではなく、その歪んだ複製だった。それは、デウス・メカニカスが我らに探し求めるように告げたものとは異なるものだった」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルの声が重く、陰鬱になっていく。{/n}「知識探求は私たちの最優先の使命だ。しかし、デメンツが約束したのは知識ではなく、その歪んだ複製だった。それは、デウス・メカニカスが我らに探し求めるように告げたものとは異なるものだった」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqals Stimme wird schwerer und düsterer.{/n} "Die Suche nach Wissen ist unsere oberste Priorität. Was Dementz aber versprochen hat, war kein Wissen, sondern nur eine verzerrte Kopie davon. Das war nicht, was der Deus Mechanicus uns zu suchen aufgetragen hat."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqals Stimme wird schwerer und düsterer.{/n} "Die Suche nach Wissen ist unsere oberste Priorität. Was Dementz aber versprochen hat, war kein Wissen, sondern nur eine verzerrte Kopie davon. Das war nicht, was der Deus Mechanicus uns zu suchen aufgetragen hat."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}La voix de Pasqal se fait plus lourde et plus sombre.{/n} « La Quête de la Connaissance est notre mission la plus importante, mais ce que Dementz nous avait promis n'était qu'une version altérée du savoir, pas ce que le Deus Mechanicus nous a demandé de chercher. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}La voix de Pasqal se fait plus lourde et plus sombre.{/n} « La Quête de la Connaissance est notre mission la plus importante, mais ce que Dementz nous avait promis n'était qu'une version altérée du savoir, pas ce que le Deus Mechanicus nous a demandé de chercher. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi, daha ağır ve kasvetli çıkıyor.{/n} "En öncelikli misyonumuz, İrfan Arayışı'dır. Dementz'in söz verdiği şey ise irfan değil, irfanın bozulmuş bir kopyası idi. Deus Mechanicus'un bize aramamızı öğütlediği şey bu değil."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal's voice grows heavier and gloomier.{/n} "The Quest for Knowledge is our mission of highest priority. But what Dementz promised was not knowledge but a distorted copy of it. This was not what the Deus Mechanicus had told us to seek."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal'ın sesi daha ağır ve daha kasvetli çıkıyor.{/n} "Bizim birincil önceliğe sahip misyonumuz İrfan Arayışı'dır. Dementz'in söz verdiği şey ise irfan değil, onun bozulmuş bir kopyası idi. Deus Mechanicus'un bize aramamızı öğütlediği şey bu değil."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
